title: Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Irish Financial Services 
Appeals Tribunal) (Designation) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (irish financial service appeal tribunal) (designation) order 2020

title: Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the
heading: 2. The Irish Financial Services Appeals Tribunal is designated for the
text_raw:
2. The Irish Financial Services Appeals Tribunal is designated for the 
purposes of Section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [423] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
